mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(createDate/1000),'%m月') as name,count(id) as value, sum(CASE WHEN isTraded = 1 THEN total ELSE 0 END) as total FROM cm_business_indent WHERE DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(createDate/1000),'%Y') = 2016 AND date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(createDate/1000),'%Y-%m') <= date_format(date_sub(curdate(), interval 0 month),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY name ORDER BY NAME DESC limit 0, 2
